installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install unzip wget ca-certificates

## Mount Pterodactyl Docker Container
if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

## Go to server directory and download PreSetup Server
cd /mnt/server
wget https://vault.our-space.xyz/ATOM/T6_Server.zip -q --show-progress

## Extract Server
unzip -o T6_Server.zip
rm T6_Server.zip

## Create Shortcut
ln -s /mnt/server/T6_Server/Server/zone /mnt/server/T6_Server/Server/Zombie/zone
ln -s /mnt/server/T6_Server/Server/zone /mnt/server/T6_Server/Server/Multiplayer/zone

## Make start Script Executable
chmod 777 /mnt/server/T6_Server/Plutonium/T6Server.sh

## Make User Aware of the Setup Origin
echo "# Unofficial Pterodactyl-Plutonium Server \nThe help is not yet written please refer to garycraft@our-space.xyz or [<@478668961626587157>](paste this in discord chat) in discord" > README.md
